description: Crafted to endure the unforgiving canadian winters, the Ayaba simplified quilted parka is built to withstand temperatures as low as -30°c. With its blend of down and feathers, it provides optimal insulation to keep you warm and cozy. The parka features a waterproof, breathable, and windproof nylon lining that shields you from icy gusts, ensuring your comfort even in harsh weather conditions. The inner cuffs offer additional warmth for your hands, while the adjustable hood and two-way zipper provide versatility and adaptability to your needs.
name: Ayaba Simplified Jacket - Womens

specs.value: White duck down, 80% down, 20% feather, fill power of 700 in³
